name: has-url
description: Check if a string at specified path contains any URLs (http://, https://, ftp://)

input.description: Any JSON object containing a string value at the specified path

path.description: Dot-separated path to the string field (e.g., 'content.text')

output.description: true if string contains at least one URL (http://, https://, ftp://), false if no URLs found or path doesn't exist or value is not a string
